mapper.select: SELECT seq, title, content, writer, view_cnt, notice_yn, fixation_yn, delete_yn, created_date, modified_date FROM dp_notepad WHERE delete_yn = 0 ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM dp_notepad WHERE delete_yn = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dp_notepad(seq, title, content, writer, view_cnt, notice_yn, fixation_yn, delete_yn, created_date, modified_date) VALUES (#{seq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, 0, #{noticeYn}, #{fixationYn}, 0, NOW(), NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE dp_notepad SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, notice_yn = #{noticeYn}, fixation_yn = #{fixationYn}, modified_date = NOW() WHERE seq = #{seq}
